product_name: Swiss Army Little Vicky Utility Knife
long_description: The Victorinox Little Vicky Utility knife brings Swiss quality and craftsmanship to a simple pairing knife. It's perfect for all kinds of everyday cutting tasks. Fully serrated, 3.5 in. blade is made of stainless steel; handle is made of durable and grippy nylon. The Victorinox Little Vicky Utility knife comes with a matching blade guard.
short_description: The Victorinox Little Vicky Utility knife brings Swiss quality and craftsmanship to a simple pairing knife. It's perfect for all kinds of everyday cutting tasks.
